summary: Removes the warpaint on Muiri and replaces her default clothing with the Tavern Wench Outfit as requested in the Forum.
descriptionHtml:
Removes the warpaint on Muiri and replaces her default clothing with the Tavern Wench Outfit as requested in the Forum.

Optional Files:

Made her a follower and gave her a facelift: Lips, nose and eyes along with either the Tavern Wench outfit or Mages Robes.

If you intend to actually use her as a follower, rather than your wife, use the file aptly named, but be aware: Muiri is an essential NPC and becomes involved in a quest that changes her essential status to non-essential, along with the fact that her confidence level seems to be hardcoded (changing it in the editor has no effect in game) so she will likely run away from most fights. If anyone knows how to solve this, please leave a comment.

Installation: Choose either the main file or one of the optional files and place the files in the data directory. Activate the esp and it\'s done.

If you want Muiri to look like in the Screensshots, you will need:

Bellas Textures(less make-up):

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Xenius Detailed Lips and High Quality Eyes:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=689

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=498

The clothes in the pictures are fitted to the UNP body by Exeter:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7305

I think that should cover it.
author: Jackelina
